anathema: Upset stable mechanisms or ecosystems, fail to correct false information
edict: Maintain order in society and the multiverse, innovate scientific and magical knowledge, record events
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Thoth (Lord of Divine Words)](/Deities.aspx?ID=524)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 314

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dead or Missing Deities](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=34)

**Edicts** Maintain order in society and the multiverse, innovate scientific and magical knowledge, record events

**Anathema** Upset stable mechanisms or ecosystems, fail to correct false information

**Area of Concern**
Magic, the moon, wisdom, writing

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35)

**Favored Weapon** [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=364)

**Domains** [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=109), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=82), [Moon](/Domains.aspx?ID=84)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Message Rune](/Spells.aspx?ID=2356)

- **3rd**
[Sea of Thought](/Spells.aspx?ID=1162)

- **5th**
[Moon Frenzy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1609)

</column>
name: Thoth (Lord of Divine Words)
religious_symbol: Scroll with lunar disk and crescent
